title: Fastest growing internet companies 2017
summary: This chart shows the Fastest growing internet in the companies competirion .
\\n From the chart we see that the Ellie_Mae Platform made the Fastest average by some margin , with only 28 .
Facebook and GrubHub made a respectable 51 and 52 average , with Shutterstock and Paycom_Software not far behind , at 28 and 46 respectively .
gold: This statistic gives information on the fastest growing online and tech companies in 2017 , based on three-year average sales growth . Food delivery platform GrubHub went public in 2014 and was ranked first with a three-year average sales growth of 52 percent .
